greetingsAvailable: Please contact me, I will write back as soon as possible!
greetingsInaccessible: You have come to the right place! Unfortunately, I am busy at this moment. Please, leave me a message, I will write back as soon as possible
introduce:
Hi, I'm Piotrek! I come from Kasinka Mała, currently living in Kraków. 
 I'm imaginative person with a strong sense of humor. I put huge emphasis on self-development. The lucky owner of a shaggy beast!
cvText: You will find my resume attached below.
